right curly must be on same line as 'catch' keyword

timeline.bodyText:
violation comment should be on the same line where it is reported, desctiption comment can be on other line.
*    if (foo) { bar(); } int i = 0;  // violation
*                  // ^^^ statement is not allowed on same line after curly right brace
